analyzed: nānā ākṛtim sukṛtinam jagataḥ śaraṇyam

śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
rakṣā karam sakala bhītivatām janānām
vāma ānanam kanaka kuṇḍala cāru karṇam

śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
bhaktyā natasya manujasya vipad virāmam
svarga apavarga phala dam vara dam dayālum

śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
santapta rūpa tilakam tilakam surāṇām
ratna ākaram kanaka kuntaka śobha hastam
bhrājiṣṇum ābharaṇa dhāraṇa diś pradam tam
śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
durgandha durgati haram durita apahāram

śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
ittham varam sakala bhūta gaṇa adhinātham

evam kvacid ratha vare sukha saṃpraviṣṭam
śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
yakṣa ādi kinnara naraiḥ munibhiḥ ca nāgaiḥ
rvidyādharaiḥ sura gaṇaiḥ danujaiḥ piśācaiḥ
sarva upakāra namitam puṭitāḥ gra hastaiḥ
śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
gandha ādi candana yutam mṛganābhibhiḥ ca

tasya anulepana kṛtena su śobhita aṅgam
śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
roga ādi nāśana karam bhajatām su nāma
śoka ādi duḥkha haraṇam sukha cintanīyam

śrī lokanātha vibudham śubha dam bhajāmi
āja anulambita karam gaja rāja madhyam

original: ye lokanāthasya sadā surabhyaṃ stotraṃ paṭhiṣyanti janā sabhāvāḥ |
